query: SELECT f.id, f.title, COUNT(us.id) as story_count FROM features f LEFT JOIN user_stories us ON f.id = us.feature_id WHERE f.user_id = 1 GROUP BY f.id ORDER BY f.created_at DESC LIMIT 5
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user V22mdELEt8WxYWD.c9cf6d5eba9c --database HUntQsx8BjuPDjNs8cJdwo --execute SELECT f.id, f.title, COUNT(us.id) as story_count FROM features f LEFT JOIN user_stories us ON f.id = us.feature_id WHERE f.user_id = 1 GROUP BY f.id ORDER BY f.created_at DESC LIMIT 5
